q_en: Which cutting tasks are for products categorized as T-shirt?

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'T-shirt';
steps.description: To find the cutting tasks for products categorized as 'T-shirt', we need to join the cutting_tasks table with the order_product, products, and products_types tables to filter the tasks based on the product type description.

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the cutting tasks for products categorized as "T-shirt". Here's what I found:

|---------|---------------------|---------------------|--------|

| 3       | January 10, 2024    | January 19, 2024    | 2      |
| 4       | January 10, 2024    | January 17, 2024    | 1      |
| 2       | January 10, 2024    | February 2, 2024    | 1      |
| 5       | January 10, 2024    | February 2, 2024    | 1      |
